I hereby declare that the immovable property as per the Schedule has been acquired by my ancestors and after them the rights have been transferred to me by law of inheritance on the land where I have constructed a house with R.C.C. slab and terrace with my own money and my name has been registered in the records of the Panchayat. I hereby transfer to you today, free of charge, the immovable property valued at Rs. 4,88,000/- in letters four lakh eighty-eight thousand rupees, which I have been given as a gift, sale, exchange, sale I will avoid all these at my own expense and continue to execute this property under you without any hindrance. For the entry of your name in the records of the Panchayat for the Scheduled Property, the relevant 1-A Forms, Specimen Forms etc. are hereby filed. The said property is not an alienated property. I agree to pay the penalty of three times the amount of such fee along with the penalty of three times the amount of such fee, if any, arising out of the non-payment of the due stamp duty, or if any of the facts are concealed in the document or if any of the provisions of the Act are contravened. This property is not an assignment by the Government under Act 9/77. I will never cancel or change this deed in future. The deed has been prepared as per the information given by the parties. This is a deed of immovable property given in writing with my consent-
Schedule:- Palnadu District, Narasaraopet R.D., Vinukonda Sub D., Vinukonda Mandal, Chikatigalapalem Gram Panchayat, Thimmaipalem Village D.No.613, which I have given you today, the land measuring 48-61 sq. m., the R.C.C. slab house with door no. 2-42, the boundaries of which are-
East:-
Road

West:- Palaparthi Govinda Reddy Garu's property

North :- Vallepu Subbaiah Gari's Asset
South :- My Taluk Storage Asset
Vallepu Kandayan

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: THIMMAYAPALEM/CHEEKATEEGALAPALEM(0-0) W-B: 0-0 SURVEY: 613 HOUSE: 2-42 EXTENT: 48.61SQ.Yds BUILT: 300SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: vallepu subbaiah property [S] donar remaining property [E]: road [W]: palaparthi govindareddy property

Gift Settlement in f/o family

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 1148 of 2026, dated 30/Jan/2026, executed by Vallepu Kondaiah, in favour of his Wife, Vallepu Padma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 48.61 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 2-42, comprised in survey number 613, Assessment No. 200910000237, situated in Thimmayapalem Village, Cheekateegalapalem Gram Panchayati, Vinukonda Mandal, within the District of Palnadu, registered at sub-registrar office Vinukonda, is bounded as follows: North by: Vallepu Subbaiah Property South by: Donor Remaining Property East by: Road West by: Palaparthi Govinda Reddy Property
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
